events.comment: This contains all the Object/Damage/Battle functions like weapons, pick items, etc.

sub-events.comment: Equip that object on left arm
Equip that object in right arm

event-group.description: Collision/Damage relate functions with impact objects
event-group.title: Impact

sub-events.comment: Destroy impact if it hit with a wall
Destroy impact if it outside of the layout (only projectiles)
Destroy impact if it timer goes out
Destroy impact if hit with a character hitbox
Push the character from an impact
this stop the push if it hits with a wall, this avoid it to pass to the other side of the wall
this stop the push if it hits with a wall, this avoid it to pass to the other side of the wall
When the character stop to push, it has N time of invincibility
